EnhancedContent:
We’re thrilled to share that Microsoft has been named a Leader in [*The Forrester Wave™: Data Fabric Platforms, Q4 2025*](https://aka.ms/Forrester-Data-Platforms-2025), receiving the highest score in the *Current Offering* and *Strategy* categories among evaluated vendors. This mark’s Microsoft’s first full participation in the Data Fabric Platforms Wave, and we believe it reflects the accelerating momentum of Microsoft Fabric since its launch in 2023.

Microsoft received the highest scores possible in 19 of 26 criteria, including key categories for Microsoft such as end-to-end data fabric, agentic AI, real-time integration, and unified data governance and security. Forrester noted in the report, “Microsoft’s forward-looking vision centers on delivering a unified, intelligent, and agentic data fabric that seamlessly integrates data management, advanced analytics, AI, and visualization at scale.”

The report recognized that Microsoft now offers the most comprehensive and end-to-end enterprise data fabric solution among hyperscalers. We provide a single, AI-powered foundation for data integration, data engineering, data warehousing, data science, real-time intelligence, and business intelligence—all built on OneLake, the industry’s first multi-cloud data lake for enterprises.

![](//dataplatformblogwebfd-d3h9cbawf0h8ecgf.b01.azurefd.net/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/Image_Data-Fabric-Platforms-Q4-2025.png)

Forrester states that “agentic AI and advanced data intelligence are redefining data fabric,” signaling a new era of intelligent, connected, and AI-driven data platforms. With ongoing innovations and new capabilities, Microsoft Fabric is leading this transformation by embedding AI, automation, and governance deeply into its foundation.

With Copilot in Fabric, users can shape data and uncover insights through natural language. OneLake unifies all data in real time with built-in security and compliance, and embedded intelligence continuously surfaces patterns and relationships to accelerate discovery and decision-making.

That’s why [customers](https://www.microsoft.com/customers/search?sq=&ff=story_product_categories%26%3EMicrosoft+365&p=0&so=story_publish_date+desc&filters=product%3Aazure%2Fmicrosoft-fabric)such as LSEG, Lumen Technologies, Apollo Hospitals, and many others are using Microsoft Fabric to unify their data, modernize operations, and power AI-driven innovation—helping organizations turn data into action faster and build a stronger foundation for the future.

## **Powered by our customers, partners, and community**

We believe the Forrester recognition reflects the collective effort of our vibrant Fabric community, including the customers, partners, and Microsoft MVPs who continue to shape the platform’s evolution. Your feedback, innovation, and trust have been instrumental in helping us build a more unified and intelligent data ecosystem.

As we continue to grow together, we remain committed to empowering every organization to achieve more with their data, accelerate insights, drive innovation, and realizing the full potential of AI. Thank you for being an essential part of this journey.

## **Read the report and see what’s next for Microsoft Fabric**

Read the full report, *[The Forrester Wave™: Data Fabric Platforms, Q4 2025](https://aka.ms/Forrester-Data-Platforms-2025),* to learn why Microsoft was named a Leader, and experience the future of Fabric firsthand at [Microsoft Ignite](https://ignite.microsoft.com/home) this November and the [Fabric Community Conference](https://fabriccon.com/) in Atlanta in March 2026. You’ll see the latest innovations across data, AI, and analytics—engage with Microsoft leaders and product experts, learn with numerous hands-on experiences, and connect with thousands from our growing community of data professionals and partners. We’ll see you there!
